org.apache.archiva.repository.maven2

Class MavenRepositoryProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.maven2.MavenRepositoryProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryEventListener, RepositoryProvider

    @Service(value="mavenRepositoryProvider")
public class MavenRepositoryProvider
extends Object
implements RepositoryProvider
    Provider for the maven2 repository implementations

      • createManagedInstance

        public EditableManagedRepository createManagedInstance(String id,
                                                       String name)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryProvider
        Creates a editable managed repository instance. The provider must not check the uniqueness of the id parameter and must not track the already created instances. Each call to this method will create a new instance.
        Specified by:
        createManagedInstance in interface RepositoryProvider
        Parameters:
        id - the repository identifier
        name - the repository name
        Returns:
        a new created managed repository instance

      • createRemoteInstance

        Creates a editable remote repository instance. The provider must not check the uniqueness of the id parameter and must not track the already created instances. Each call to this method will create a new instance.
        Specified by:
        createRemoteInstance in interface RepositoryProvider
        Parameters:
        id - the repository identifier
        name - the repository name
        Returns:
        a new created remote repository instance

        public ManagedRepository createManagedInstance(ManagedRepositoryConfiguration cfg)
                                        throws RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryProvider
        Creates a new managed repository instance from the given configuration. All attributes are filled from the provided configuration object.

        Parameters:
        cfg - the repository configuration that contains the repository data
        Returns:
        a new created managed repository instance
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if some of the configuration values are not valid
